name: Log Riders
description:
Log Riders is an exploration physics based first-person platformer game, where you have to try get to the end of the stage while without falling in the water. The game will feature more stages later in the development and some new twists and craziness to make a dynamic and varied gameplay.

The game is still in development, I hope to show more of its wackiness and exploration gameplay in the next updates.

This alpha demo features 3 stages and a secret one. Can you find it? :)

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Changelog v_04m1

- Added V-sync option
- Fixed checkbox reseting values
- Increased Player speed
- Fixed reset function

System Requirements

OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, or 10
Processor: 2.0 ghz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia, AMD, or Intel OpenGL 4.0 / DirectX 11 graphics

Controls

Movement: WASD + Mouse
Jump: Spacebar
